entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
